modName: DMX - X Gon Give It To Ya (From Deadpool) Combat Music Replacer
summary: Whenever your character is engaged in combat 'DMX - X Gon Give It To Ya' from the movie 'Deadpool' will play.
descriptionHtml:
To anyone who does want this song to be only INCLUDED in the combat music and wants to keep the original combat tracks skyrim. Please visit this mod:Â 


As this mod replaces all combat music with 'DMX - X Gon Give It To Ya'. And the linked mod does not, it is only included into the tracks and will play randomly with the original songs whenever you are engaged in combat.
author: Uggie
